properties.description: the digits character of radix worker.

properties.description: the min length of radix worker.

properties.description: the algorithm type of sha worker.

properties.description: the switch of jwt worker.

properties.description: the algorithm type of jwt worker.

properties.name: nichetoolkit.rest.jwt.secret
properties.description: the secret of jwt worker.

properties.description: the kid of jwt worker.

properties.description: the issuer of jwt worker.

properties.description: the audiences of jwt worker.

properties.description: the expire time of jwt worker.

properties.name: nichetoolkit.rest.jwt.expire-unit
properties.description: the expire-unit of jwt worker.

properties.description: the issued delay time of jwt worker.

properties.name: nichetoolkit.rest.jwt.issued-delay-unit
properties.description: the issued delay unit of jwt worker.

properties.description: the auto verify switch of rsa worker.
